text: The page is acting weird when I zoom in. Elements shift around. Chrome browser.
Is the database slow? The search bar is taking 10 seconds but only for 'shoes'. Everything else is fast.
I can't save my settings. The console says something about CORS policy.
Emails look broken in Outlook 2013. The layout is smashed.
I can't log in. Every time I type my password which includes a % symbol, the page just throws a server error 500.
Major billing issue: if I click the 'Pay' button twice quickly, it actually charges my card two times. The button should disable itself.
The app is totally unusable on my Pixel 6 (Android 13). It just freezes on the logo screen when I open it.
Security Alert: Our audit found that the 'uploads' S3 bucket is public. Anyone can write to it.
My customers are complaining that they aren't getting the password reset emails. I checked the logs and they are being dropped.
The math is wrong in the cart. I have a 10% discount applied but the final total is still showing the full price.
The system is broken.
It's not working on my computer.
I am very frustrated with this update.
Error.
Why is the data wrong?
The QR code for 2FA setup is invalid. When I scan it with Google Authenticator, it says 'Invalid key format'.
On the 'About Us' page, the team photos are overlapping the text footer on iPad Pro (Portrait mode).
Prometheus metrics are missing for the new recommendation-engine service. We are flying blind on CPU usage.
Typo in the main header: it says 'Welocome' instead of 'Welcome'.
API request to POST /orders is failing with a 400 Bad Request if the JSON body contains a trailing comma.
